The '''abjuration''' school of [[arcane magic|magic]] encompassed protective spells, though some of them have aggressive uses. They created physical or magical barriers, negated magical or physical abilities, harmed trespassers, or even banished the subject of the spell to another [[plane]] of existence. The abjuration school had no subschools. A [[wizard]] who specialized in abjuration was known as an [[abjurer|''abjurer'']].

Some abjuration spells included [[Antimagic field|''antimagic field'']], ''[[dispel magic]]'' and ''[[resist energy]]''.
